::: {#8a6b8985 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import warnings 
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", category=UserWarning, module="palmerpenguins")
from palmerpenguins import load_penguins
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

penguins_df = load_penguins()
penguins_cleaned_df = penguins_df.dropna()

species_counts = penguins_cleaned_df['species'].value_counts()
```
:::


Show Matplotlib Charts

::: {#df155b18 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plot = plt.figure()
plot.set_figwidth(6)
plot.set_figheight(3)

plt.bar(species_counts.index, species_counts.values)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-1.png){width=500 height=263}
:::
:::


::: {#a919be0b .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
plot.savefig("matplotlib_bar.png")
```
